Despite Fiom's comments concerning the National Agreement, Sergio Marchionne insisted its conditions would remain, while the introduction of a Saturday evening shift would only occur should the need arise and with a resulting overtime payment. Full utilisation of the 18 shifts would also enable an increase in annual pay of around EUR3,500( US$ 4,690) per year, added the Fiat chief.
